articles.description: 247Sports acquired more than 160 pages of emails from UCLA as part of an ongoing open records request, and while those emails don’t shed much light on the Bruins’ process of negotiating with the Big Ten, they do provide a window into the blowback within the U…
articles.content:
“It always seems impossible until it’s done.” – Nelson Mandela
Those were the words written under Big Ten commissioner Kevin Warren’s email signature when he received UCLA Chancellor Gene Block’s ap… [+6452 chars]
